channel.title: ..::Project PK::.. ~ Old School PK
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/support1.jpg[/img][/center]
Welcome to my latest server development. My old server got lost with a clean up I had the other day so I have decided to make a new one, this time, aiming much higher than I did on my last development.
I am going for a server that has something new, and that hasn't been seen anywhere else before. I plan to work on my own content that gives the server it's individuality. I am also using a brand new client, with nothing on it.
Source I started with: Project Pearl V2. Client I started with: Bluurr's Client.
Current Goals:
Fix all teleports, some don't actually teleport you to anywhere, others teleport you somewhere random, and others have a drop down message. ~ 0% Develop my own minigame. ~ 0% Upgrade the client to more of a HD Client ~ 0%

Godswords aren’t old school.

o.O Didn’t mean to type old school, was talking about old school when I typed this topic
[/quote]

What? I don’t really understand that post :S[/quote]

Godswords have been out for a while

I was on the topic of old school Runescape PKing to a friend on MSN when I made this post.

Read full topic

Welcome to my latest server development. My old server got lost with a clean up I had the other day so I have decided to make a new one, this time, aiming much higher than I did on my last development.

I am going for a server that has something new, and that hasn’t been seen anywhere else before. I plan to work on my own content that gives the server it’s individuality. I am also using a brand new client, with nothing on it.
